sources.title: The Hassanlou Chalice - Jaam-e Hasanlou (1964)
sources.description: Title: The Hassanlou Chalice - Jaam-e Hasanlou (1964) Directed by: Mohammad Reza Aslani Date of birth: 1943, Rasht, Guilan, Iran Writing credits: Mohammad Reza Aslani Year: 1964 Country: Iran Language: Farsi Color: Black & White Runtime: 20 min. Synopsis Story of the Hassanlou chalice, which becomes the story of Mansour Halladj.
